turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order something from Starbucks, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good afternoon, how can i be of your assistance today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a vanilla bean latte. vente.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what type of milk do you want in your drink?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok let me confirm all that info with you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: we have 1 order of venti size vanilla bean latte, 2% milk with whipped cream on top is that your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is my order. The one in Chicago, Illinois.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which store you would like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok we have a store on 105 2. adams shall we orxer from there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: perfect drink has been ordered at the store and will be ready for pickup shortly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.
